import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const UpdateRestaurant = () => { const {id} = useParams(); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [location, setLocatin] = useState(""); const [priceRange, setPriceRange] = useState(""); return (
setName(e.target.value)} className="form-control" type="text" />
setLocatin(e.target.value)} className="form-control" type="text" />
) } export default UpdateRestaurant
